So, Stories. The Story is...That they are...everywhere. And you can broadcast them to The Entire World from the palm of your hand, I mean Yeah,You saw a sunset...Saw a dog...You saw a flower,And yes!... You bought breakfast, Bought a coffee,You bought a sandwich?...I'll have what he's having!...And O.K.,Now you can tell your stories in 10 Seconds...6 Seconds...3 Seconds?...Disappearing Stories...Huh, you done?... But come on,to lose yourself in the story,You have to do it properly!".(CLAPPERBOARD SHUT!) "And action!". "Hang on!.(YELLING!.) (EXPLOSIONS!.)Not like that...Or that...Or that... (DOORBELL RING!.)Definety not like that  Great Stories are the one's you can lose yourself in, You can't do it like that!". "Hi Dad!". "No, To really lose yourself in a story, It means No pings,No alerts,No click me, No swipe me. No like me's!...Feels good doesn't it?...Imagine what two hours feels like.
